original_title: 新怪談残虐非道・女刑事と裸体解剖鬼
overview: Kasuko, a female detective who aims at Tamiya, a doctor of medicine who manufactured an android of a serial killer. She heads alone to Tamiya's mansion for revenge on her murdered sister! Set in Kyoto in 1960, an action horror depicting a female detective chasing a bizarre serial murder case.
tagline: Action horror challenged by action actress Yukiko Saiya!
title: The Naked and the Living Dead
